name: learning-word-generator
description: A word generator that teaches itself your phonotactics
author: aaronjameslang@googlemail.com

scripts.build: npm i &&  npm run format -s && npm run test -s && npm run lint
scripts.profile: REPEAT=100 node --prof test/characterisation/generateWords.js && npm run -s profile-view
scripts.update: npm update && npm shrinkwrap --dev && npm outdated
